question: Ice cores, varves and what else indicate the environmental conditions at the time of their creation?

nodes.text: Mountain ranges indicate the environmental conditions at the time of their creation, along with ice cores and varves.
Fossils indicate the environmental conditions at the time of their creation, along with ice cores and varves.
Magma indicates the environmental conditions at the time of its creation, alongside ice cores and varves.
Tree rings, ice cores, and varves indicate the environmental conditions at the time of their creation.
